record.titleName: Visit, Jean Louis Vigier, Mayor of Paris
record.description: Mayor of Paris visits the University of Chicago. Representatives of both faculty and students greet Mayor of Paris Jean Louis Vigier on a visit to the University of Chicago. University vice president R. Wendell Harrison, dean of the faculties, joins with 19-year-old senior Carol Saposnik of (5305 West Gladys) Chicago in welcoming the mayor to the campus. Vigier visited the Institutes for Basic Research and the Argonne Cancer Research Hospital at the University of Chicago where mankind's first atomic nuclear reactor was created.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Separate caption-second one with no corresponding photo.
